characters.name: Keeper of the Bell
line:
Ah the weird little girl,
what are you doing here kid?

characters.name: David
line: Is.. is there a bug on me?

characters.name: Erik
line:
I am Erik Ahlberg, new Head Officer of
Trolberg Safety Patrol. Enemy of Trollkind!

characters.name: Elf King
line:
The giant girl, sworn enemy of me
and my people!

characters.name: Frida
line:
Caring is my main extracurricular activity.
Look at all of these badges I have!

characters.name: Forest Giant
line: I'm looking for an old friend...

characters.name: Johanna
line:
Are you sure you're going to
be okay out there without me?

characters.name: Kaisa
line:
Don't do anything fishy
this time around.

characters.name: Lindworm
line:
Do you have any new
treasures of the earth?

characters.name: Matilda
line:
Hello sweetie, call me Tildy.
Tell Kaisa dear I said hello!

characters.name: Peter
line:
You're the future neighbor's kid,
are you spying on me child?

characters.name: Principal
line:
Welcome to Edmund Ahlberg Elementary
School, I am Principal Magnusson!

characters.name: Rat King
line:
Have you... secrets to trade
... with the Rat King?

characters.name: Raven Leader
line: Hope you have a great adventure!

characters.name: Great Raven
line:
I'm not really the Great Raven
I'm a thunderbird!

characters.name: Tontu
line:
No I am not taking you through
Nowhere Space. It's a sacred
space for all Nisses

characters.name: Vittra
line:
Did you dig up my friends?
We're not weed, we're Vittras!

characters.name: Woodman
line: Eager to leave the woods... city girl?

characters.name: Troll
line: ( As long as it's daylight, it's just a rock )
